isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 10 SPEED AND 15 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT, RTO, AND RTX SERIES - INSTALL - AIR FILTER/REGULATOR/SLAVE VALVE

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve "H" Port (inset, Figure 300) and the HI Range Port of the range cylinder.

figure.caption: Figure 300. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve "H" Port and Range Cylinder HI Range Port

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve "L" Port (inset, Figure 301) and the LO Range Port of the range cylinder.

figure.caption: Figure 301. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve "L" Port and Range Cylinder LO Range Port

step1.para: If previously removed, install the two O-rings (inset, Figure 302). Position the air filter/regulator on the auxiliary housing rear. Install the two retaining bolts and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 302. Position Air Filter/Regulator on Auxiliary Housing Rear

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve "S" Port (inset, Figure 303) and the air filter/regulator.

figure.caption: Figure 303. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve "S" Port and Air Filter/Regulator
